secondaries.shortDescription: Before the first turn (But after deployment), opponent target one CHARACTER model he owns (if no character, then a WARLORD). (6 pts) if the targeted model is killed by a melee attack made by a Dark Angels model, (+3pts) if the melee attack came from an Inner Circle or Deathwing model, (+6pts) if the unit that destroyed the targeted opponent model survives

subObjectives.description: Opponent model targeted (CHAR. or WARLORD) is killed by a melee attack
The melee attack is made by an Inner Circle or Deathwing model from your army
Your Dark Angels unit that destroyed the targeted opponent survives

secondaries.shortDescription: 2 points each time enemy unit is destroyed by a Ravenwing model from your army that moved 12" or more OR made a charge move that turn

subObjectives.description: Killed a unit with a Ravenwing that moved 12" or OR did a charge

secondaries.shortDescription: At your first command phase, select an objective. For each consecutive command phase that control that selected objective, make more points (turns/pts: 2/2 3/3 4/5 5/5)

subObjectives.description: You controlled the objective for 2 consecutive turns
You controlled the objective for 3 consecutive turns
You controlled the objective for 4 consecutive turns
You controlled the objective for 5 consecutive turns
